downloadTitle: PerformancePoint Data Source Inventory template (SharePoint Server 2010)
downloadDescription: This PerformancePoint Data Source Inventory template will help you create a data source inventory.
detailsSection: When you configure PerformancePoint Services in Microsoft SharePoint Server 2010 for your environment, one tool that can save you and dashboard authors much work is a data source inventory. You would typically use a data source inventory to list and track the various data sources that your organization might use with PerformancePoint Services. This PerformancePoint Data Source Inventory template will help you create a data source inventory.
systemRequirementsSection: Microsoft Office Excel 2007 or Microsoft Excel 2010
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download button in the upper right corner of this page to start the download.
  2. Click Save or Save this program to disk.
  3. Find the file on your hard disk and double-click it to open it.
